Revive the nostalgia with our Chrome extension! Restore the iconic Blue Bird favicon on Twitter.com for a touch of authenticity.

Elevate your browsing experience and reconnect with the essence of Twitter. Embrace the Blue Bird charm today!

It works for all tabs opened after extension is installed.
